attributes.additional_details:
We, the citizens of Britain demand a Government that hold our safety as a priority, irrespective of holiday commitments. We elect you to be a public servant..we are too busy earning a living and paying taxes.
We the citizens of Britain demand a society that, irrespective of race, gender, religion, sexual orientation, background or class,respects other peoples well being, aspirations and property.
We, the citizens of Britain require our government to stop the shameful points scoring and to do more for the people who elected you.
We, the citizens of Britain, demand our Government to set policies by the ballot box rather than tabloid headlines.
We, the citizens of Britain, demand a Government that understands that their wrong doing (Cash for Honours, Expenses, BskyB) have led to a complete loss of faith in authority. Being taught morality by people who are ammoral is a joke.
We, the citizens of Britain, demand a constitution.
